plot: 11 years after 9/11, A embittered blind officer is begging for some mercy in the middle of downtown Manhattan when a young men comes to his aid and offers him an opportunity to redeem himself through a sign that the police had next to him.
title: The Sign
plot_es: 11 years after 9/11, A embittered blind officer is begging for some mercy in the middle of downtown Manhattan when a young men comes to his aid and offers him an opportunity to redeem himself through a sign that the police had next to him.
plot_en: 11 years after 9/11, A embittered blind officer is begging for some mercy in the middle of downtown Manhattan when a young men comes to his aid and offers him an opportunity to redeem himself through a sign that the police had next to him.
